abstract: BHP Billiton said Tuesday it had named former Ford Motor Chief Executive Jac Nasser to succeed Don Argus as its chairman.
snippet: BHP Billiton said Tuesday it had named former Ford Motor Chief Executive Jac Nasser to succeed Don Argus as its chairman.
lead_paragraph: The global miner BHP Billiton has named the former Ford Motor chief executive Jac Nasser as its new chairman to succeed Don Argus, the company said on Tuesday. Mr. Argus will retire in early 2010.

headline.main: BHP Billiton Names Ex-Ford Chief Nasser as Chairman

abstract: Jacques A. Nasser will succeed Don Argus as chairman at the mining company.
snippet: Jacques A. Nasser will succeed Don Argus as chairman at the mining company.
lead_paragraph: LONDON  The mining giant BHP Billiton said on Tuesday that it had named the former chief executive of the Ford Motor Company, Jacques Nasser, as chairman, ending an 18-month search for a successor to Donald R. Argus.

headline.main: BHP Names Ex-Chief of Ford Chairman
headline.print_headline: BHP Names Ex-Chief Of Ford Chairman
